channel.title: Some problems
channel.description:
1- If i spam clicking on a tree, I will get start getting logs faster here's my woodcutting class: http://pastebin.com/taUAYfZ5
2- I've added real membership count down and i want to add something in my quest tab to show how many member ship days left, I've tried something like that "+membership().checkDate" and "+membership().getTodayDate" but none of them works.
Anyone knows how i can fix any of this? Thanks.

item.title: Some problems
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

For your woodcutting you could try make a check if the event is already running. If the event is running then just don’t do anything. You might be executing multiple events each time you click on the tree.

For the membership you can do something like
startDate = todaysDate
endDate = startDate + 30days
(probably not the best way)

Just skim through Java docs to find how how to best use the data function.

Edit: try loading the membership status using MySQL

Read full topic

Anyone knows how i can fix any of this?
Thanks.
